targets.query:
from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "proxmox")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "pve2")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])
SELECT last("gauge.idle") FROM "default"."cpu-average" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge.system")+ last("gauge.user")+ last("gauge.interrupt") FROM "cpu-average" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
